Methods

# jsonFormula(json, globals, expression, customFunctionsopt, stringToNumberopt, languageopt, debugopt) → {*}

Compile and execute a json-formula expression. If executing the same expression multiple times, it is more efficient to create a class instance of {JsonFormula} and call the search method multiple times.

Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Default Description
json object | array

the json data on which the expression needs to be evaluated
globals object

global objects that can be accessed via custom functions.
expression string

the expression to evaluate
customFunctions object <optional>
 {}

custom functions needed by a hosting application.
stringToNumber function <optional>
 'null'

A function that converts string values to numbers. Can be used to convert currencies/dates to numbers
language string <optional>
 en-US
debug array <optional>
 []

will be populated with any errors/warnings

View Source json-formula.js, line 93

the result of the expression being evaluated

*
